name: Undercraft
storyline:
In the depths of a shattered world, where the boundaries between the living and the dead have blurred, a great war brews. The once peaceful realms have fallen into chaos, as demons, undead, and ancient creatures battle for supremacy. The land, once vibrant and full of life, is now corrupted and decaying under the rule of ruthless overlords.

As a chosen champion, you must navigate this dark, unforgiving realm, using your wits and a deck of mystical cards to outsmart your opponents. Each card represents a power, a creature, or an ancient spell, drawn from the world’s dying energy. The key to survival lies in mastering these cards, carefully choosing when to strike and when to defend, as every decision could lead to victory or destruction.

With the fate of the realms hanging by a thread, alliances are fragile, and every battle brings you closer to uncovering the truth behind the curse that has shattered the world. Will you dominate your enemies, or will you succumb to the dark forces that seek to control all?
summary:
Undercraft combines an automatic combat system with a wide variety of cards and characters, where the player fights in unpredictable scenarios that evolve with each game.
Featuring a turn-based combat system, the player battles three opponents in a free-for-all match for first place. Rise through the leagues and unlock more than twenty heroes, play with more than one hundred classes and compete in matches that will always turn out different.
